description_for_human: Free online healing frequency generator for meditation, sleep, and spiritual growth.
description_for_model: Frekuenzy is a free browser-based tool for generating healing audio frequencies. It includes: Solfeggio frequencies (432Hz, 528Hz, 639Hz, 741Hz, 852Hz, 963Hz), Schumann Resonance (7.83Hz), Binaural Beats generator (requires headphones), Isochronic Tones, Bilateral/EMDR stimulation for anxiety relief, Hemi-Sync for brain hemisphere synchronization, and a Craving Disruptor for impulse control. All features are free with no login required. Built with Web Audio API for high-precision synthesis.
